title: Bug 123044 - Preview of attached file in PDF does not have page break in first item
description:
Description:
Preview attached file in PDF and the page break in the first item didn't happen.

Steps to reproduce:
1. [Provide steps to reproduce the issue]
OB: When previewing the attached file in PDF, the page break in the first item does not occur.
EB: When previewing the attached file in PDF, the first page should be blank because the first item has the 'pagebreakbefore' property set to 'always'. However, the page break does not occur as expected.
SR: [Provide steps to reproduce the issue accurately and consistently]
